## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description         | Type      | Default     |

| `gaps`        | `gaps`         | Columns gaps        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `isCentered`  | `is-centered`  | Centered            | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isDesktop`   | `is-desktop`   | Desktop             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isGapless`   | `is-gapless`   | Gapless             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isMobile`    | `is-mobile`    | Mobile              | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isMultiline` | `is-multiline` | Multiline           | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isVcentered` | `is-vcentered` | Vertically centered | `boolean` | `false`     |
